text: geulihayeo junim-i neoleul seontaeghayeo neoege kkum-eul haemonghaneun jihyeleul galeuchyeo jusigo eunhyeleul chungmanke ha sieo yagob-ui jason-eul beonseongke hasi ni ineun neoui du seonjo abeulahamgwaisag-ege chungmanke haessdeon geosgwa gat-eum ila sillo junim-on asimgwa jihyelo chungmanhasim-ila
